message.content:
The task is to identify the specific line item and value that represent the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period.

In the cash flow statement, this is typically represented by "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable," which indicates the change in liabilities owed to suppliers.

From the given data:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable  | 2390000.00 | 2024-01-31 |

The positive amount of 2390000.00 indicates an increase in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services purchased on credit.

Thus, the value to extract is "2390000.00".

```json
{"solution": {"value": "2390000.00"} }
```
